ccre.saver

Class StorageProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • ccre.saver.StorageProvider
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    IgneousStorageProvider

    public abstract class StorageProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    The holder for the current storage provider, and the superclass for any storage providers.

      • openStorage

        public static StorageSegment openStorage(java.lang.String name)
        Open a StorageSegment for the specified name. The name of a StorageSegment must contain only letters, numbers, currency symbols, and underscores.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the storage segment.
        Returns:
        the StorageSegment that has been opened.
